trans-unit.source: An abstract base class for perspective and orthographic projection cameras.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the distance from the camera of the camera's far clip plane.
If the user does not specify a value for this property, its value defaults to positive infinity.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Double that specifies the distance from the camera of the camera's far clip plane.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.FarPlaneDistance*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> which defines the direction in which the camera is looking in world coordinates.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Vector3D that represents the direction of the camera's field of view.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.LookDirection*> dependency property..
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the distance from the camera of the camera's near clip plane.
It is recommended that this property be set to a positive value.
If the user does not set a value for this property, its value defaults to 0.125.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Double that specifies the distance from the camera of the camera's near clip plane.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.NearPlaneDistance*> dependency property..
To be added.
Gets or sets the position of the camera in world coordinates.
Note that this property returns the location of the camera, not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.LookDirection%2A> on which the camera's projection is centered.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> that specifies the position of the camera.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.Position*> dependency property..
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> which defines the upward direction of the camera.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Vector3D that represents the upward direction in the scene projection.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.UpDirection*> dependency property..
To be added.
